{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WNR2500 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/23/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY313200232 |ic_id=4054A-13200232 |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A, PMV147.002B, 1303, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3206EM2I-12G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 MiB |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9425G6JH-5 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A, PMV147.002B, 1303, TAIWAN; |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8236;AR8326-AL1A, SS5A6.40, 1311, CHINA; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|N450 Wireless Router}}
{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WNR2500}} ==Reviews== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32251-netgear-wnr2500-n450-wireless-router-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :Most useful specifications are per '''SNB''''s review. :"2976453001" is silkscreened on the board. :QCA9558-AT4A WiSoC ('''Richwave''' PAs?), AR8236 FE Switch, '''Macronix''' MX25L3206EM2I-12G SPI Flash, '''Winbond''' W9425G6JH-5 RAM, has serial header
